h1.span: We Are Looking For pics With Pairs Or Groups of Our Seniors
When They Were In Grades k-12 With Their Friends.

span.a: WORK PERMIT INFORMATION DURING THE STATE OF EMERGENCY

p.span: Our staff is very important to us. We will continue to handle all of our essential job duties, though most of this will be done from home for the next month. Administration and office staff will monitor their voice mails and emails from home and will respond as soon as possible. Please use email for teaching staff. If you have any questions, concerns or emergencies regarding virtual learning or chromebooks, please use the contact information below.

div.class: o9v6fnle cxmmr5t8 oygrvhab hcukyx3x c1et5uql ii04i59q
o9v6fnle cxmmr5t8 oygrvhab hcukyx3x c1et5uql ii04i59q

p.span: If you call school at 262.878.2434, you may leave a VM at the following extensions. You may also email the contact at the email listed.

li.span: If you have a Chromebook issue, dial 1294 for our IT Director, Meko Stanosevic - m.stanosevic@ug.k12.wi.us

div.class: o9v6fnle cxmmr5t8 oygrvhab hcukyx3x c1et5uql ii04i59q

li.span: For elearning issues that have not been addressed by your student’s teacher, dial 1203 for our Principal, Joel Adamczyk - adamjoe@ug.k12.wi.us

div.class: o9v6fnle cxmmr5t8 oygrvhab hcukyx3x c1et5uql ii04i59q

li.span: For general District related questions dial 1207 for Karen Mutter - muttkar@ug.k12.wi.us

div.class: o9v6fnle cxmmr5t8 oygrvhab hcukyx3x c1et5uql ii04i59q

li.span: For general school related questions dial 1201 for Patti Halbach - halbpat@ug.k12.wi.us

div.class: o9v6fnle cxmmr5t8 oygrvhab hcukyx3x c1et5uql ii04i59q

li.span: For athletics or activities dial 1286 for Dave Pettit - pettdav@ug.k12.wi.us

div.class: o9v6fnle cxmmr5t8 oygrvhab hcukyx3x c1et5uql ii04i59q

li.span: To reach the District Administrator, Al Mollerskov, dial 1208 - mollala@ug.k12.wi.us

div.span: March 16-17: No school or virtual learning
All school activities and activities scheduled in Union Grove High School District building are canceled March 16-April 3 as well.
